definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

pinyin: Huang2 jia1 Jia1 le4 bi3 Hai3 you2 lun2 gong1 si1
containing_words.word: 皇家加勒比海游轮公司

sentences.english: because he is on a cruise ship 4000 miles away from here.
sentences.chinese: 因为他已经在一艘离这儿4000英里的游轮上了。

sentences.english: Anthony lost his job and his life on the fancy boats.
sentences.chinese: 安东尼失去了他的工作和他在豪华游轮上的生活。

sentences.english: Then, we continue to the next exciting tour on a small cruise, the Argosy Cruise.
sentences.chinese: 过后我们就一路走下去到码头乘搭游轮。

sentences.english: He was getting rich himself, too, by working on the cruise line.
sentences.chinese: 通过在豪华游轮公司的工作，他自己也富裕了起来。

sentences.english: None of the tourists were taken hostage, but the ship was seized along with its seven-member crew.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何游客被绑架，但是游轮和7名船员被扣押。

sentences.english: Its owners claim it is the most technologically advanced cruise ship in the world.
sentences.chinese: 拥有人声称它是世界上技术最先进的游轮。

sentences.english: His job was working in those luxurious cruises.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作完全是在那些奢侈的游轮上。

sentences.english: The Getaway is the the company's second-newest ship.
sentences.chinese: “挪威畅意号”也是挪威公司第二全新游轮。

sentences.english: This is the right moment for you to jump in and ask for a cheap cruise ticket.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个正确的时刻为你跳中，并要求廉价游轮票。

sentences.english: A North Korean, with a bouquet of artificial flowers, joins the ceremony celebrating the departure of the cruise ship.
sentences.chinese: 一个朝鲜人拿着一束鲜花参加游轮的出航意识。

sentences.english: More and more European nobles and rich people got to American through the cruise.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的欧洲贵族和富人们通过豪华游轮来到美国。

sentences.english: I went on a Carnival Cruise to Cozumel for my last Spring Break hurrah during college.
sentences.chinese: 我乘坐嘉年华游轮去科祖梅尔过大学的最后一个春假。

sentences.english: We cruised to Alaska last year.
sentences.chinese: 我们赴年搭游轮到阿拉斯加。

sentences.english: Embark on three-, four- and seven-night cruises, or private, customised charters.
sentences.chinese: 走上三，四和七夜游轮，或私人，个性化的包机。

sentences.english: Later, group of soldiers of fortune ride the speed boat, but to, planned that robs the cruise.
sentences.chinese: 稍后，一群雇佣兵乘快艇而至，打算抢劫游轮。

sentences.english: He had to teach a bit, or work on cruise ships.
sentences.chinese: 他为了谋生还教些书，有时在游轮上打打工。
